Augment.Name: Melodic Guard
Augment.Description: Melodic Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to dance.

Augment.Name: Hysteria
Augment.Description: Hysteria Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to have Bestowe Curse cast on them.

Augment.Name: Obsession
Augment.Description: Obsession Attack Proc: 100% extra threat for 15 seconds.

Augment.Name: Paranoia
Augment.Description: Paranoia Attack Proc: Half threat for 15 seconds.

Augment.Name: Solipsism
Augment.Description: Solipsism Attack Proc: Dazed for 6 seconds.

Augment.Name: Alien Mind
Augment.Description: Will Save +10: This item gives a +10 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.

Augment.Name: Uncanny Awareness
Augment.Description: Reflex Save +10: This item gives a +10 Resistance bonus to your Reflex saves.

Augment.Name: Subtle Ambition
Augment.Description: +2 to the DC of your Conjuration and Illusion spells

Augment.Name: Chaotic Ambition
Augment.Description: All of your spells gain a 1% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Dismagicka
Augment.Description: Adds Shattermantle to weapon attacks. When a Shattermantle weapon strikes a foe that has spell resistance, the value of that spell resistance is reduced by 3 for 9 seconds. A fe can only have its SR reduced by one Shattermantle effect at a time.

Augment.Name: Feareater
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to provide a Sovereign Nightmares. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has below 5,000 Hit Points, a burst of pure terror emanates from this weapon, snuffing out its life as if it were the subject of a Phantasmal Killer spell. If your target has above 5,000 Hit Points, they instead take significant Force damage.
